EigenMeat.EigenMaze
Class NetHandler

java.lang.Object
  EigenMeat.EigenMaze.NetHandler
public class NetHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This is the primary network subsystem. Used by both clients and the server, this class interfaces the network code with the engine code.

Method Detail

setID

public void setID(short id)
Sets ID used by the network code to manage multiple clients. Is set when the client first connects to the server.

Parameters:
id - the value that id gets set to.

connect

public void connect(boolean isServer,
                    java.lang.String ip,
                    int port)
Sets up network. Determines if this will e a server, and which ip and port to use

Parameters:
isServer - true if this is the server, false if a client.
ip - ip that client will connect to
port - port to be used

add

public void add(NetEntity entity)
Adds a NetEntity to the network. This will set up a NetEntity, and send it to all participants in the current game.

Parameters:
entity - the NetEntity to be added

update

public static void update(NetEntity entity)
THIS CODE ISNT WORKING PARTICULARLY WELL. Anyway, this updates the called entity, at least it should. The idea here, is like add, it updates the called entity across the entire network, however I am still working on this code, so use at your own risk..

Parameters:
entity - the NetEntity to be updated
